title: Gab and Juls: Barcelona's Nightmare Scenario
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Barcelona's 3-3 draw with Inter as their status as a Champions League side hangs on a knife-edge and analyze the financial impact on the club were they to get knocked out. The guys also ask why Kylian Mbappe has spoken out against PSG now instead of after the World Cup, praise Chelsea after their 2-0 win over AC Milan and ask why Didi Hamann won't be on Jurgen Klopp's Christmas card list.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Barcelona set to lose out financially due to UCL performance; Mbappe jeopardizing France's World Cup?; Chelsea's dominant display over AC Milan
